---
title: "Tables"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

load("ERFOutput/narrow_error_table.RData")
load("ERFOutput/main_error_table.RData")
```

```{r table1-output, echo=FALSE}
# Create the table with kable and kableExtra
table <- kable(Table, format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE, 
               caption = "Whole Sample Model Errors") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "scale_down"))

# Print the table
table
```

```{r table2-output, echo=FALSE}
# Create the table with kable and kableExtra
table <- kable(error_table, format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE, 
               caption = "Policy Change Sample Model Errors") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "scale_down"))

# Print the table
table
```
